description: This file is a Node.js script that acts as a shim to run Sass using npx, allowing environments without globally installed Sass to compile styles. It forwards command-line arguments to the `npx sass` command and manages process execution and error handling.

methods.name: run()
methods.description: Main function that captures command-line arguments, determines the correct npx command based on the platform, spawns a child process to run Sass via npx, and handles process exit and errors.
